name: DEMON HELL
description:
Instructions

(somehow, the ingame instructions got corrupted in the html5 export, so here they are )

Left click to shoot ESDF to move
R to pickup weapons
Mouse wheel/Space to change weapon

Kills as much demons as you can
At the end of each level,
You must sacrifice something to go further ...

Made by Valden
For LDJAM 43

DEMON HELL

A brutal arcade twin stick shooter. Battle against countless demons while descending further and further into hell.

Beware, at each floor you will have to sacrifice something ...

Features :

- Crt Graphics
- Endless demons
- 7 weapons
- 2 enemies
- 10 deadly sacrifices
- Around 40 seconds of music
- 9 Color palettes
- Online Leaderboard

Created using Game maker : Studio 2 (code & engine), Aseprite (graphics), FL Studio and LSDJ (Music and sfx).

Source Code

You need to Import the project into Game Maker Studio 2 by going into File > Import Project, then choosing the .yyz file

You can also rename the file to .zip and open it this way
